Title: A Ghostly Message
Description:
Excuse me, $n is it? You've made quite a name for yourself lately, for both the living and the dead. 

I have in my possession the Tome of Thomas Thomson. For years it has been in my library, a reminder of times we must not forget. Imagine my surprise when the tome flings itself to the floor, falling open to a page with a single name on it.

Yours, $n.

If Thomas' spirit is trying to reach you, then I think you should take this tome. Perhaps he awaits at the Scarlet Monastery?
ObjectivesText: Look for Thomas Thomson near the Scarlet Monastery in Tirisfal Glades.
